SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Interfaces

Interface LobbyControllerInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
LobbyController
public interface LobbyControllerInterface
Interface that defines the methods that a lobby controller should implement in order to manage the addition and removal players in the lobby and start the game

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addPlayer(String nickname, ViewInterface view, GameControllerReceiver gameControllerReceiver)
    Add a player to the lobby notify all the players views of the join
    ViewInterface
    removePlayer(String nickname)
    Remove a player from the lobby notify all the players views of the leave
    GameController
    startGame(CardTable cardTable, PersistenceFactory persistenceFactory, GameList gameList, MalevolentPlayerManager malevolentPlayerManager)
    Start the game with the players in the lobby create the game adding to it all the players that were in lobby and creates and bind to the gameController the newly created game

  • Method Details

    • addPlayer

      void addPlayer(String nickname, ViewInterface view, GameControllerReceiver gameControllerReceiver)
      Add a player to the lobby notify all the players views of the join
      Parameters:
      nickname - player's nickname
      view - player's view
      gameControllerReceiver - player's game controller receiver

    • removePlayer

      ViewInterface removePlayer(String nickname)
      Remove a player from the lobby notify all the players views of the leave
      Parameters:
      nickname - player's nickname
      Returns:
      the view of the player removed

    • startGame

      GameController startGame(CardTable cardTable, PersistenceFactory persistenceFactory, GameList gameList, MalevolentPlayerManager malevolentPlayerManager)
      Start the game with the players in the lobby create the game adding to it all the players that were in lobby and creates and bind to the gameController the newly created game
      Parameters:
      cardTable - the card table used to map cards to their ids
      persistenceFactory - the persistence factory used to save the game
      gameList - the game list used to remove the game when it ends
      malevolentPlayerManager - the malevolent player manager used to manage malevolent players
      Returns:
      the game controller created
